page.title: 18Religion:Glenalmond College
page.content: {Scripture Union} This meets every week in one of the masters' houses. About twenty boys go each week and about 3 masters. We speak on topics related to life and the Bible and Christianity. Each meeting starts with prayers and singing. Then there are notices and after that a look at the week's topic. At the end there is a closing prayer, and then a chat over coffee and biscuits. {Sunday School} This meets every Sunday in the Music School for masters' children. There are four classes with a teacher for each (masters' wives) and a total of 20 children. They work with Scripture Union material which is relevant to their age group and sing, pray and collect money. Each year they perform a Christmas Play.
